details.COMMENTS: Area closed for the demolition of Randolph Hall, and the construction of Mitchell Hall
The sidewalk will be closed for a construction laydown area for the duration of the Burruss renovation project.

External repairs are being completed around the top of Fralin Hall, in order to weatherproof the envelope of the building. Boom lift will be used around the building during this time to reach the top of the building.
The east bus loop will be closed to install a pantograph mast arm.
Torgersen Hall Building Envelope Improvement Project- Tuckpointing , adding structural wall ties, replacing clerestory windows, Hokie Stone repairs

name: Old Turner Street Steam Joint Replacement

details.COMMENTS: Demo a section of Old Turner St to access the steam tunnel for replacement of High pressure expansion joint ( Closed portion of old turner )
Area closed for construction of the New Business Building. See attached logistics and mobility plan.
Two construction zones remain closed until project completion.
The lot will be closed to install the parking gate conduit.

Courtyard area will be closed. Courtyard exterior exit doors may be re-routed during the construction process. Occupants may experience typical construction-related noise and dust associated with the work. Work will occur 9:00 a.m. to 3:00 M-F.
The lots will be closed to install the parking gate conduit.

name: Fleet Services ADA Parking and Pathway

details.COMMENTS: There will be contractors grading, milling and paving a new ADA parking spot and ADA path.  This will temporarily affect the normal driving path to the fuel center.
